objects.description:
Configuration: Disallow Malformed/Invalid Transfer-Encoding Headers used in obfuscation, such as:<xhtml:ul>
                  <xhtml:li>Headers with no space before the value “chunked”</xhtml:li>
                  <xhtml:li>Headers with extra spaces</xhtml:li>
                  <xhtml:li>Headers beginning with trailing characters</xhtml:li>
                  <xhtml:li>Headers providing a value “chunk” instead of “chunked” (the server normalizes this as chunked encoding)</xhtml:li>
                  <xhtml:li>Headers with multiple spaces before the value “chunked”</xhtml:li>
                  <xhtml:li>Headers with quoted values (whether single or double quotations)</xhtml:li>
                  <xhtml:li>Headers with CRLF characters before the value “chunked”</xhtml:li>
                  <xhtml:li>Values with invalid characters</xhtml:li>
               </xhtml:ul>
objects.name: coa-273-9
